briefdescription.para: Archive the BOutlineListView object to a message.

parameterdescription.para: The message to archive the object to.
true to archive child views.

briefdescription.para: Create a new BOutlineListView object from the message archive.

parameterdescription.para: The message to create the object from.

briefdescription.para: Hook method called when a mouse button is pressed while the cursor is contained in the frame of the outline list view.

detaileddescription.para: Responds to mouse clicks expanding or collapsing sections of the outline when the user clicks on a latch.

parameterdescription.para: The point on the screen where to mouse pointer is when the mouse button is pressed.

briefdescription.para: Hook method that is called when a key is pressed while the view is the focus view of the active window.

detaileddescription.para: Responds to arrow keys to provide the ability to navigate the outline list or to expand or collapse sections of the outline. Inherits the keys recognized by BListView.

The following keys are used by the outline list view by default:
Right Arrow Expands the selected item.
Left Arrow Collapses the selected item.

parameterdescription.para: The bytes of the key combination pressed.
The number of bytes in bytes.

briefdescription.para: Hook method called when the outline list view is moved.

parameterdescription.para: The point of the top left corner of the frame that the view has been moved to.

briefdescription.para: Hook method called when the outline list view is resized.

parameterdescription.para: The new width of the view.
The new height of the view.

briefdescription.para: Hook method that is called when a mouse button is released while the cursor is contained in the frame of the outline list view.

parameterdescription.para: The point on the screen where to mouse pointer is when the mouse button is released.

detaileddescription.para: Similar to AttachedToWindow() but this method is triggered after all child views have already been attached to a window.
Similar to AttachedToWindow() but this method is triggered after all child views have already been detached from a window.

briefdescription.para: Hook method that is called when the outline list view is removed from the view hierarchy.
Hook method called when a message is received by the outline list view.

parameterdescription.para: The message received by the associated looper.

briefdescription.para: Adds the item one level deeper and immediately after superItem.

parameterdescription.para: The item to add.
The item to add under, if NULL adds to end.

simplesect.para: true if the item was added, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds the item to the end of the list.

parameterdescription.para: The item to add.

simplesect.para: true if the item was added, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds the item at fullListIndex.

parameterdescription.para: The item to add.
The index to add item at.

simplesect.para: true if the item was added, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds a list of items to the end of the list.

parameterdescription.para: The list of items to add.

simplesect.para: true if the items was added, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds a list of items at fullListIndex.

parameterdescription.para: The list of items to add.
The index to add item at.

simplesect.para: true if the items was added, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Removes the item from the list.

parameterdescription.para: The item to remove.

simplesect.para: true if the item was removed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Removes the item located at fullListIndex from the list.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the BListItem removed.

briefdescription.para: Removes count items starting at fullListIndex from the list.

simplesect.para: true if the items were removed, false otherwise.

description.para: These methods replicate similar methods in BListView except work on the full list.

briefdescription.para: Returns a pointer to the BListItem at fullListIndex.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the the BListItem at fullListIndex or NULL if not found.

briefdescription.para: Returns the full list index of the item at where.

simplesect.para: The index of the item at where or -1 if not found.

briefdescription.para: Returns the full list index of item.

simplesect.para: The index of the item at where or -1 if not found.

briefdescription.para: Returns a pointer to the first BListItem in the list.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the first item in the list or NULL there are no items.

briefdescription.para: Returns a pointer to the list BListItem in the list.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the last item in the list or NULL there are no items.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether or not the list contains the specified item.

parameterdescription.para: The list item to check.

simplesect.para: true if item is in the list, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of items contained in the outline list view.
Returns the index of a currently selected item relative to the passed in index.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the item to get relative to the selected item's index.

briefdescription.para: Empties the outline list view of all items.
Returns whether or not the outline list view is empty.

simplesect.para: true if the outline list view is empty, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Calls the specified function on each item in the outline list.

parameterdescription.para: The function to call on each item.

briefdescription.para: Calls the specified function on each item in the outline list.

parameterdescription.para: The function to call on each item.
The second argument of the function.

simplesect.para: BListView::DoForEach(bool (*func)(BListItem* item, void* arg), void* arg)

briefdescription.para: Sort the items according the the passed in compare function.

parameterdescription.para: The compare function to use to sort the items.

memberdef.name: SortItemsUnder

briefdescription.para: Sorts the items under superItem.

parameterdescription.para: The base item.
if true, only items located one level under superItem are considered.
The compare function to use to sort the items.

briefdescription.para: Creates a BOutlineListView object from the archive message.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new BOutlineListView object.

The name of the view.
Whether the list view supports a single selection or multiple selections.
The resizing mode flags. See BView for details.
The view flags. See BView for details.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new BOutlineListView object suitable for use in a BLayout.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the view.
Whether the list view supports a single selection or multiple selections.
The view flags. See BView for details.

briefdescription.para: Delete the outline BOutlineListView object and free the memory used by it.

detaileddescription.para: This method does not free the attached list items.

briefdescription.para: Collapses the section referenced by item.
Returns the number of items under superItem.

parameterdescription.para: The base item.
if true, only items located one level under superItem are considered.

simplesect.para: The number of items under superItem.

briefdescription.para: Calls eachFunc for each item under superItem.

parameterdescription.para: The base item.
if true, only items located one level under superItem are considered.
The function to call on each item.
The second argument of eachFunc.

briefdescription.para: Expands the section referenced by item.
Fill out the _width and _height parameters with the preferred width and height of the list view.

parameterdescription.para: The list view's preferred width is written to _width.
The list view's preferred height is written to _height.

briefdescription.para: Reports the suites of messages and specifiers that derived classes understand.

detaileddescription.para: Reports the suites of messages and specifiers that derived classes understand.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether or not the section that the item at fullListIndex is expanded or not.

simplesect.para: true if the section is expanded, false if it is collapsed.

briefdescription.para: Returns a pointer to the item at index under superItem.

simplesect.para: If oneLevelOnly is false, this method acts like FullListItemAt() except the first item in the list is considered to be superItem.

parameterdescription.para: The base item.
if true, only items located one level under superItem are considered.
The index of the item to get.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the item at index under superItem or NULL if not found.

briefdescription.para: Highlight or unhighlight the selection when the list view acquires or loses its focus state.

parameterdescription.para: true to receive focus or false to lose it.

briefdescription.para: Performs an action give a perform_code and data. (Internal Method)
Resize the view to its preferred size.

briefdescription.para: Returns a pointer to the item at one level above item.

briefdescription.para: If code is B_SWAP_OP, swap the items in data, otherwise pass the arguments to BListView::DoMiscellaneous().

The data to act on.

briefdescription.para: Used by derived classes to override how an item is drawn.

The area of the item to draw.
Whether or not to draw the background in addition to the contents.

memberdef.name: DrawLatch

briefdescription.para: Used by derived classes to draw the latch.

parameterdescription.para: The area of the item to get the latch area of, this is passed to LatchRect() to get the latch area.
The level of the item to get the latch area of, also passed to LatchRect().
true to draw the latch in a collapsed state, false to draw the latch in an expanded state.
true to draw the latch in a selected state, false to draw the latch in an unselected state. Unused by the base class.
Unused by the base class.

briefdescription.para: Toggle the expanded state of item.

parameterdescription.para: The item to toggle.
If true, expand the item, if false, collapse the item.

briefdescription.para: Used by derived classes to return the latch area.

parameterdescription.para: The area of the item to get the latch area of.
The level of the item to get the latch area of.

memberdef.argsstring: (BList *tree, bool oneLevelOnly, int(*compareFunc)(const BListItem *a, const BListItem *b))
memberdef.name: _SortTree

briefdescription.para: Expands upon BListView to display a hierarchical list of items.

detaileddescription.para: Items with subitems underneath them are called super items and are drawn with a small arrow to the left of their label. The label faces right if the item is collapsed and faces down if the item is expanded.
An example of an outline list view looks like this:

simplesect.para: BListView for more info on how to use a list view, most of which also applies to an outline list view.
